references.paper_title: EDVR: Video restoration with enhanced deformable convolutional networks
references.reason: This paper is foundational for video restoration methods using enhanced deformable convolutions, a technique that is improved upon in this paper.

references.paper_title: BasicVSR++: Improving video super-resolution with enhanced propagation and alignment
references.reason: This paper significantly improves the performance of video super-resolution (VSR), which is crucial as a building block for more advanced video restoration tasks.
This paper introduces a transformer-based approach to video restoration, a significant departure from previous methods that utilized convolutional neural networks.

references.paper_title: All-in-one image restoration for unknown corruption
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant to the concept of all-in-one restoration, which AverNet extends to videos and incorporates temporal dependencies.

references.paper_title: Promptir: Prompting for all-in-one blind image restoration
references.reason: This paper introduces the use of prompts to guide all-in-one image restoration, a method adopted and further developed by the current work for video.
